author: Al Jazeera
title: NATO to deploy thousands of commandos to nations near Ukraine
description: NATO chief Stoltenberg says alliance is also beefing up arms support to Kyiv and reinforcing defences on allied areas.
content: NATO Secretary-General Jens Stoltenberg said on Friday that the alliance was deploying thousands of combat-ready troops to Ukraines neighbours, as well as continuing to send weapons to Ukraine includâ€¦ [+2386 chars]
